text: The men's K-1 1000 metres competition at the 2018 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships in Montemor-o-Velho took place at the Centro de Alto Rendimento de Montemor-o-Velho. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Thursday 23 August 2018 || 12:20 || Heats |- | rowspan=3|Saturday 25 August 2018 || 09:51 || Semifinals |- | 11:38 || Final B |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| 12:21 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final A |} All times are Western European Summer Time (UTC+1) ==Results== ===Heats=== The six fastest boats in each heat, plus the three fastest remaining boats
